resources.string: SDA0010
Welcome to 4In Shield!
Who is going to use this device?
Welcom to 4IN Shield
Please add your child\'s devices

The information from your child\'s device will help us to access their mental health,duration of sleep,places visited,used applications etc.It also gives you the ability to block or allow installed applications.
Please follow the following steps :
1.Bring your child’s mobile phone
2.Scan this QR code with your child\’s device camera
3.You will be redirected to the 4IN shield application download page
4.Once the application is installed,
click Next
Please enter your child \'s social media account information
This information will help us to protect your child from online abusive content and cyberharassement
Your child\'s profile information has been successfully added
Please enter the required information to complete your chil\'s profile
congratulations
You have successfully completed your child profile
Thank you for your confidence in us
Mama always said life was like a box of chocolats.You never know what...
